course_description: This course provides an overview of research methodology in the biological sciences and application of evidence to practice. Distinctions will be made between research and evidence based practice with an emphasis on appraisal of best evidence in a focused area of interest.
sections: Class Nbr: 2557, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: T 10-11:50a, Instructor: Staff, Status: Open
